page.title: 10FARMS IN ABERDOUR
page.content: There are{seven}farms in our area. They are{Banks Head,Bouprie Banks, {Banks Farm,Dalachy Farm,Mill {farm,Pleasants farm}and{Parkend {Crossgates.Pleasants farm}is an animal farm which has{82}pigs{95}cattle and{2000}hens. Their hens lay an average of{1800}eggs a day.The farmer has eight fields,some large.{Parking {Crossgate}is a mixed farm and it has {200}cattle.They also have over{200 acres of field.{Dalachy Farm}is also a mixed farm it has{500}sheep and{200 {cattle.}Mill farm is joined on to Bouprie Banks and is a mixed farm too.It has{37}acres of field it has a hundred hens and the average number of eggs that the hens lay is{6}dozen.They have{96}milk cows,{46}dry cows and{200 young cattle.The farm grows barley and wheat.
